languages.text: Each time the {g|f:3159a138a7ee4cc48f4c88ebd3399d96}Relaying{/g} Psyber-Raven retargets a Psyker ability, it receives 3 Direct damage and +3 WIL. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: Each time the {g|f:3159a138a7ee4cc48f4c88ebd3399d96}Relaying{/g} Psyber-Raven retargets a Psyker ability, it receives 3 Direct damage and +3 WIL. Stacks.

languages.text: Whenever a {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} is {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}relayed{/g} through the psyber-raven, it suffers 3 {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} and gains +3 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}. Stacks.
languages.original_text: Когда {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}психосила{/g} {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}ретранслируется{/g} через псайберворона, он получает 3 {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}прямого урона{/g}, но его {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воля{/g} увеличивается на 3. Суммируется.

traits.locale_text: Whenever the {g|f:3159a138a7ee4cc48f4c88ebd3399d96}relaying{/g} psyber-raven channels a psychic power, it suffers 3 direct damage and gains +3 Willpower. Stacks.

Whenever a {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} is {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}relayed{/g} through the psyber-raven, it suffers 3 {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} and gains +3 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}. Stacks.

Whenever a {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} is {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}relayed{/g} through the psyber-raven, it suffers 3 {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} and gains +3 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}. Stacks.

languages.text: Ruhsiber kuzgun, her {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}ruhsezi gücü{/g} {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}aktardığında{/g} 3 puan {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}doğrudan hasara{/g} maruz kalır ve +3 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}İrade{/g} kazanır. Etki üst üste birikebilir.
languages.original_text: Whenever a {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} is {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}relayed{/g} through the psyber-raven, it suffers 3 {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} and gains +3 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: Ruhsiber kuzgun, her ruhsezi gücü {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}aktardığında{/g} 3 puan doğrudan hasara maruz kalır ve +3 İrade kazanır. Etki üst üste birikebilir.

Ruhsiber kuzgun, her ruhsezi gücü {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}aktardığında{/g} 3 puan doğrudan hasara maruz kalır ve +3 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}İrade{/g} kazanır. Etki üst üste birikebilir.

languages.text: Cada vez que se {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}transmite{/g} un {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}poder psíquico{/g} a través del psicocuervo, este sufre 3 puntos de {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}daño directo{/g} y gana +3 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g}. Este efecto es acumulativo.
languages.original_text: Whenever a {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} is {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}relayed{/g} through the psyber-raven, it suffers 3 {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} and gains +3 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: Cada vez que se {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}transmite{/g} un poder psíquico a través del psicocuervo, este sufre 3 puntos de daño directo y gana +3 de Voluntad. Este efecto es acumulativo.

languages.text: 每当生化渡鸦{g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}中继{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}灵能能力{/g}时，生化渡鸦都会受到3点{g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}直击伤害{/g}，{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}提高3点。此效果可叠加。
languages.original_text: Whenever a {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} is {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}relayed{/g} through the psyber-raven, it suffers 3 {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} and gains +3 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: 每当生化渡鸦{g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}中继{/g}灵能能力时，生化渡鸦都会受到3点直击伤害，意志提高3点。此效果可叠加。

languages.text: Wenn eine {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psionische Kraft{/g} durch den Psitech-Raben {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}übertragen{/g} wird, erleidet er 3 {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}Direktschaden{/g} und erhält +3 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g}. Stapelbar.
languages.original_text: Whenever a {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} is {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}relayed{/g} through the psyber-raven, it suffers 3 {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} and gains +3 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: Wenn eine psionische Kraft durch den Psitech-Raben {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}übertragen{/g} wird, erleidet er 3 Direktschaden und erhält +3 Willenskraft. Stapelbar.

languages.text: Chaque fois qu'un {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}pouvoir psychique{/g} est {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}relayé{/g} via la psyber-corneille, elle subit 3 points de {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}dégâts directs{/g} et gagne +3 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Force mentale{/g}. Cumulable.
languages.original_text: Whenever a {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} is {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}relayed{/g} through the psyber-raven, it suffers 3 {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} and gains +3 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: Chaque fois qu'un pouvoir psychique est {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}relayé{/g} via la psyber-corneille, elle subit 3 points de dégâts directs et gagne +3 Force mentale. Cumulable.

languages.text: サイバーレイヴンを通して{g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}超能力{/g}が{g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}引き継がれる{/g}場合、直接3の{g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}ダメージ{/g}を受け、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志力{/g}が+3される。この効果はスタックする。
